name: Shaolin Sudoku
description:
The Yin Yan is a concept of dualism. There must be some darkness in the light and some light in the darkness. Shaolin Sudoku borrows this idea and presents it in an aesthetic Sudoku game. It is made by an Indian indie developer.

Sudoku is a logic based number puzzle. The objective is to fill the missing numbers in a 9×9 grid with the digits 1 to 9 so that each row, each column, and each 3×3 sub-grid has no duplicate numbers.

The game has the following main features :
☯ Puzzle generator. The game has no database of pre-made puzzles. It rapidly creates entirely new sudokus with unique solution.
☯ Themes. 8 beautiful themes that reflect in the entire game. Some themes help to play more comfortably in the dark.
☯ Auto save. Don't worry about loosing any unfinished game, continue where you left off.
☯ Statistics. View your best and average times for each difficulty level.
☯ Portrait and Landscape modes. Play in any orientation, with auto rotation for seamless transition.
☯ Displays perfectly regardless of screen size and aspect ratio. So it can also be played effortlessly in split view!
